name: Jody Brown
text: She can make just about anything! Shorts, shoes, shirts, underwear, frames, stickers, decals, you name it! Call her today to get a quote! She is great!

name: Lainie Abney
text: I've received my Monthly packet for 3 months now. It's so uplifting! The Devotion Booklet has been a huge source of armouring up in the Word of God. I love each T-shirt. And the Prayer Card that I display in my Kitchen. I'm always on the go. And this helps me in my Journey & Adventure to stay prayed up with Our Lord. So Thankful💞

name: Diana Scorpio
text:
Great quality shirts that fit perfectly to me! One delay in shipping, weather related, but I received an email from the company letting me know about the delay and then another when it shipped! Small, privately owned company.
BUT..beware! There is a company using a similar name and they are a scam. Shipping is from overseas and they charge you every month! Make sure you are ordering from the correct site!! My bank had to refund me $130!! Other than that...I love this company!!

name: Mara Bolin
text:
I’m so disappointed. I’ve tried calling this company several times only to get message they will return my call and never do?!
I’ve emailed with promise they will get back to me. They never have?
I’m being charged for two Christian boxes when I only need one and cannot get ahold of anyone to straighten out my dilemma???
I thought I am dealing with a reputable Christian based company, yet find customer service will not help me???

name: Christina Fish
text: Great quality shirts with inspirational message! I always have people asking where I got my shirts from when I wear them ( I have a few and always love their free Friday shirts!) This company is very honest and family run. I have even started buying gifts from them too. They truly have a heart to spread the good news!

name: annie cobb
text: Ordered from this company on April 02, 2021. Have not received my order as of yet. I tried calling and they don't even answer the phone. I have since reported this company to the better business bureau. They operate under the guise of being a Christian company, that is as further from the truth as anything I have ever heard. They get your money and refuse to even speak to you. Everybody, you had better do your home work before you order from them. There are a couple of more online companies that do a far better job than these crooks. Be Ware!!!! I would give a 0 rating if I could

name: Chastity Napier
text: I have ordered several shirts and they are great quality.  Only 1 shipping delay which was weather related-so definitely not their fault.  I have only ordered T-shirts so I can't speak for anything else but I was happy with the product.

name: Maria Lee
text: I ordered a memorial for my 2 daughters that passed away when they were 41/2 & 3. I uploaded a picture of them instead I get a picture of a man with their names & dates. I can't get in touch with anyone here. The picture of my girls should have been on there. I don't know the gentleman on this that I paid almost $60 for and waited weeks for. Now I can't get in touch with anyone.

name: Angela Riley
text: I've been a customer for a while now, and ordered over 20 shirts from this company. I DID experience some shipping delays when a tornado caused major damages to the area and power outages, shipping delays, etc. Hardly their fault. There was a missing package that the local post office misplaced. Eternal Light replaced it at no additional cost. Their business is growing fast, and they have hired new people to help keep up with it. Most importantly, the tee shirts are my favorite. Just the right weight and fit, not too thick, not too thin, they wash well, the designs are well done, I pretty much live in them 24/7, I buy larger sizes to sleep in and smaller ones to wear during the day. They're honest people, selling great products! And no, in case you're wondering, I do not know them personally, just a big fan of the company and their products!

name: Constance Hardin
text: Their shirts 👕 are amazing. Very soft. Don't shrink when washed. I've got about ten of their shirts now and mom does too. The shirts 👕 are excellent quality. I also ordered two pics this past Christmas and they were gorgeous. I just love this company. 😇❤👍

name: Alix Micheau
text: Ive ordered quite a few shorts from here and I usually have them within two to three weeks. Very reasonably prices as well. The tshirts are of good material and thankfully do not shrink when washed!

name: christina brennan
text: I have ordered and paid for 2 different items. Cannot get anyone on phone. Always rings busy. I really loved these 2 shirts been a month and nothing one says shipped but just sitting in same spot

name: Janice Ketcham
text:
UPDATE ON REVIEW: After contacting my bank and stopping payment on the second box from Eternal Light Co, I did receive my first box. (2 month later) I never did hear from the company and did cancel my account with them.
Buyer beware!!!! They will take your money and send you nothing, they won't get back in touch with you. I've sent 3 notices, 2 emails and the phone is always busy. It's been a month and a half now and nothing. I don't normally do bad reviews but I really think you should be ware.

name: L C
text: SCAM SCAM SCAM!! BUYER BEWARE!! THEY TAKE YOUR MONEY AND SEND YOU NOTHING. no phone number. I emailed 20 times. no response. DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME OR MONEY

name: Tiara Diaz
text: I remember ordering my shirt from them after an ad on Instagram (they really know my weakness) It was truly easy to buy and with it being the free Friday shirt event and all I needed to do was pay shipping costs. I was really excited for this shirt "there was another in the fire". After I ordered the shirt 2 days later I got an email from one of the owners letting me know that my order was going to be backed up due to the tornados they were experiencing (this was back in April) I really appreciated the heads up about the delay but devastated because of the position they were in. But after 2weeks they were able to ship my shirt and it got to my house quickly. I love my shirt the quality it amazing, it is so soft and after a bunch of washes it still looks brand new. I get so many complements. I love getting emails from the site about sales and even an encouraging word. Truly love it!

name: Keda Johnson
text: Company produced by Satan himself! I wish I would of read the reviews before dealing with this company! I ordered on May 3, 2021 and have gotten no response! I have emailed customer service several times! Please do not buy from this company! I learned a lesson...Everything that look good, is not good for you!

name: michelle want
text: I would give a zero if I was able. I placed an order over a month ago and not only have I not gotten it, there is not anything to track because it hasn't even been shipped. I have sent multiple emails, I have gotten ONE response that was generic. Telling me that had over 55k orders waiting! I requested a refund - crickets! No one answered the phone. It goes to a busy signal. I don't like to give bad reviews, especially for a small, private company. But, customer service goes a LONG way.

name: Vicki Snyder-Young
text: I love this company. The message is great and so are the products. It is a small family run business so the shipping is a bit slow but I personally think its growing pains. Seems they are growing fast! We need more companies like this.

name: CM Vigil
text:
SCAM!!!!!!  There should be an option for zero stars, or negative!  This business hooks people to believe that they are Christian based.  Which may be the case, but I wouldn’t know because I have NOT received the merchandise that I ordered.  I have emailed them 3 times, and received NO REPLY!  Their phone has a busy signal.  Probably other UNHAPPY people.

UPDATE…finally received t-shirt.  Good quality.  But, took a very long time.  Still feeling frustrated and let down by this company.  I have yet to receive a reply.  Really like the products shown.  But, they are simply not trustworthy.

name: Amanda Banda
text: I would give no stars if I could..... ordered a shirt almost a month ago, still no shipping info. The number is constantly busy, I called like 12 times in one day and no answer. I have written at least 4 emails with no response. Time to turn them into the better business bureau!!

name: rach winkler
text: This company doesnt even deserve 1 star.  This company is not legit, it takes your money and you get no product. Beware fake company!!!  i cant get a good number for them and no response from the multiply emails i have sent.  They have stolen money from me.  DO NOT PURCHASE ANYTHING FROM THIS COMPANY!!!!

name: Anna Cordeiro
text: This t-shirt is nice quality and super soft; an instant favorite! Thank you Eternal Light!

name: Joel and Kathy Davisson
text: I highly recommend this company.  They have been awesome.

name: Jessie Guillot
text: This is a scam!!! They took over a month to send my order then somehow enrolled me in a subscription that I didn’t sign up for!! Now I’m getting charged nearly $20 a month for a subscription I never signed up for and have tried canceling!! They sent an email saying it was canceled but still continued to charge me! I have called the costumer service number 5 times and left 4 messages with no contact!! I had to lock my card because of the charges!

name: Anita Spencer
text: This company deducted from my bank account without my permission. Will not return phone calls. This is a company of thievery. DO NOT TRUST THEM

name: Scott LiCausi
text: I have written this company many times! I received the wrong sizing on shirts after being told from their customer service to order this size and it would be fine. After receiving, the shirt it is no where what they said. I reached out, and they want me to pay for shipping back theses shirts. I am NOT paying for something that I have written emails stating the sizes were right. They have since gone quiet, took my money and refuse to respond back. I emailed Trent who is the owner and he as well does NOT respond and couldn't careless about his customers or customer service. As long as he brings in the money, and he's gotten plenty from me, that is all he is interested in. Pretty sure Jesus wouldn't be like this, in fact bible states, be more like him! Will not purchase ANYTHING else from this company and will continue to advise all to stay away until my issue is resolved.

name: Tonia Cole
text: I really hope that this is a legit business using God as the catch for it. I placed an order a few monts ago, money was taken out, no shirts, no replies to emails and no phone calls can be made. The reviews and the BBB have had numerous complaints, have mercy on you if this is a scam

name: charlotte fike
text: Best Tshirts ever reasonable prices. I've ordered at least 12 shirts and I love them all.

name: Ashley Thweatt
text: Horrible Customer service and overpriced T-shirts! I originally ordered because I thought Ok it's a Christian run company trying to help so even though its overpriced I ordered about and 2 extra shirts I just got my box.(4/9/21) I ordered and received it (5/18/21)which I'm very disappointed in and the two extra shirts I ordered or not there.This is the worst company I have ordered from in a very long time. I even had to file with my bank to get the box sent and its overpriced bad looks like dollar store stuff and still missing my shirt!! Don't waste your money y'all!

name: Dewanna Baksh
text: Love this company! The lighted praying hands solar light is absolutely beautiful!

name: Ellie Fletcher-Lobo
text: I would be ordering from this company more if I could I'm so addicted.  A few health issues makes me have to put the medical bills first but gift giving this year is going to be fun!!

name: Stacey Johnson
text: I Ordered 3 T-Shirts a month ago. Never received my Merchandise. On July 5th 2021 they Charged my Bank Account 19.97 for A Box that I DID NOT order. I Disputed The Charges at My Bank and Thank God My Bank is going to Refund me The 38.87 the price of the T-Shirts that I never received..This is A Evil Company to be able to use God To Take from those of us that are wanting to purchase God logos or Memorial Items.  They are a Very Dark people to Do this. Their buisness will be brought down. God knows who these people are..May God Have mercy on your Souls.. oh and 1 more Thing on Facebook page the Blocked me because I was warning people not to give them money..so There you go..Please do NOT give your money to these Thieves.

name: Sheila Harper
text: Ordered a “Warrior Box” on May 7, 2021. Never received a confirmation. Attempted multiple times to contact the company after receiving text and email advertisements, but not my order. It is now June 16th and I have not received my package. Since I never received a confirmation, I did not have an order number to “check the status of my order,” so eventually received a response from the “other” option. Email came from “Customer Support” with the subject “Wufoo Other Inquiries.” I was informed that they ran out of hats and were getting more in that Friday and the order would ship. Been 15 days since then and I have received nothing. And to think, I even provided a (luckily) small tip!! I may never receive anything, nor my money back - and now attempting to prevent any further charges to be withdrawn from this company as I learned after the fact that you can “cancel the monthly box membership at any time,” when I thought I had placed a one time only order. I have sent multiple texts and emails back to this company and received no further response. DO NOT ORDER FROM THIS COMPANY!!

name: vincent law
text: Great company, family oriented. I love their products

name: Roisin Petty
text: I have ordered and paid for several shirts from this company. I have only received 3 of the 7 shipments that I have already paid for. I have made attempts to reach out via email and telephone. I haven't heard anything yet so far. I really do love the items I have received. I'm just trying to get some answers as to where the rest of my previously purchased items will get to me. I wish I had known that the customer service was horrendous!

name: Laura Ballard
text: I placed an order for a "Christian box" on 5-7-2021. Have yet to receive said order. I have sent 3 emails regarding my order. Nothing. Today, I was charged $19.97 for my second "Christian box". My plan as of right now is to A. Dispute the charges with my financial institution, B. Report this company to the BBB and C. Tell any and everybody NOT to do business with this company.

name: AUTOLAND HYUNDAI SERVICE DEPT
text: I have had nothing but positive experiences with this company. Absolutely love their T shirts, soft comfortable and fit nicely.

name: Tammy Swindall
text:
I paid $79 over  a month ago for a box and 5 Tshirts. I have not received anything. I have emailed many times with no response. I want my money back. There is no phone number on the contact page.
I am disabled and really was giving the money to help but since I didn’t get what I ordered I really need my money back please.

name: Connie Sanford
text: Still have not received my order. Been quite some time.

name: ashley delaney
text: I ordered $65 worth of shirts on March 19.  On April 29 I received and email stating that it had shipped.  When I followed my tracking number the package still to this day (May 30) says “Ready to go” and has not left the facility.  I have tried to use the customer service email 3 times, Facebook messenger, and wrote a less than desirable review and I have not heard a word from them.

name: Joy Cherry
text:
I urge you to read ALL of the reviews before doing business with this company.
NIGHTMARE!!! I ordered a shirt I absolutely loved and of course paid for it at the same time. When I didn't receive any kind of confirmation after a few days (they had already withdrawn my money) I started contacting them via emails. They had basically never heard of me. They put all of the tracking issues on me and let me say, that was NOT easy due to receiving nothing from them. They sent me emails telling me they are a small company, told me not to email to this or that adress but to certain other's. I eventually got my refund. NIGHTMARE!! I will never deal with this compay again.

name: Terry Knutson
text: I ordered two sets of praying hands that are solar. I ordered them for my dad's grave. They were ordered in March and I have yet to receive them. They will not answer any e-mails or phone calls. Seems that I am out $70 DO NOT ORDER ANYTHING FROM THEM

name: Kristan McDonald
text: I am very disappointed with this company. I wish I would have read the reviews first. Back in 2020 they sent me my items I purchased but I have yet to receive anything that I ordered on 4/16/21 and I have tried reaching out in every possible way. The phone is disconnected and the emails are never responded to. I can't imagine what I will have to go through to get my money back but I def want it back and I will take my business else where.

name: Sarah Anderson
text: Do not buy from this company or you will have to dispute the charge with your credit card company like I had to. I ordered a shirt on May 23 and they took my money that day but prossed to never sent me my shirt. I contacted them and they told me first to wait to it ships. Ummm on ill wait a few day and a week & a half later no tracking number & no shirt. I contacted again no answer...They maybe a Christian company but they do not act at ALL Christ-like.

name: J M
text: Placed an order for subscription box and two other shirts on March 6th 2021. They charged my credit card. And they even charged me for an April subscription box. The April subscription box money was returned to me and I canceled my subscription! But I haven't received my first box from March or the two other shirts that I ordered with that same order. Have emailed them at the beginning of the week oh, it's now Friday and they are closed oh, and they haven't responded to my email yet. I will be contacting them on Monday by phone that I found on a Google search site and if my problems not resolved I'm filing a complaint with the Better Business Bureau. Had I known they had so many complaints when I ordered, I wouldn't have ordered, let alone tipped them! They advertise themselves as a Christian T-Shirt Company but I feel taken advantage of, and that's not how Christians should treat other Christians!!

name: Nan Martinez
text: Their t-shirts are fabulous! Well made, beautifully designed!  Great deals. Christian organization!

name: Johni Dixon
text: My order a Christian box and shirt. She never receive order.  She email them and noresponse, and tracking number. She canceled the order to get money back and hasnt recwice nothing,

name: Georgeanna Smith
text: I placed an order on 3-26-2021 and I have not received my order yet. Customer is awful and they never tell the truth. I have asked for my refund and have not received it yet. This company is a true scam. If you like losing money then just order something.

name: Larinda Scragg
text: I ordered a shirt 2 months ago and have not received it. I have sent numerous e mails and I don't get any satisfying answer. What is up?

name: James B.
text: Very good company to order shirts and grave site decorations. They are very helpful.

name: Pamela G.
text: I ordered a “box” and a couple other shirts. I was charged immediately but it took weeks to get the initial order in the torn shipping bag.  A second box was charged to my debit card before the first one even came! The shirts run small so I gave them away! I won’t even bother to use the two “gift cards” I got with the shirts, stickers, and little booklets just because everything was pretty cheesy!

name: Susan Daul
text: My T shirt is quality & sharp looking!

name: Ashley Hoover
text: Order a t-shirt and the Christian monthly box, a few weeks ago. Paid for the items. Never received a track information. Have sent emails and tried to call, with no response. To be a Christian company and not respond and leave customers hanging, is just not right. I will not be ordering from them again!

name: Mary Hadaway
text: WARNING DO NOT ORDER FROM THIS SO CALLED CHRISTIAN CO. They took 80.00 from my account. I ordered 3 weeks ago still haven’t received order. I live in Birmingham al I will drive to this co if I have to get my order . They are located at Adamsville al .and Warrior al. A lot of bad reviews!!!

name: Khandi Stewart
text: I ordered my shirts back on April 2nd and am still waiting for them to ship. I was given the excuse that the weather was bad in Alabama.  Today the weather is 62 degrees and no shirts or even message saying they have shipped.

name: Lori West
text: I received my t shirt but I can't wear it because it has a hole in it. These people won't respond to my correspondence and voice mails. I am very disappointed in these so called Christian people.

name: Beth Weinfurter
text: I have orderd from them seven weeks ago and still nothing. Message them several times and still no response.I will never be going through them again.

name: Dolores Hernandez
text:
STAY AWAY FROM THIS COMPANY! Purchased a solar memorial light and have not been given a tracking number or any kind of email of communication for my actual purchase. I have however been sent over 30 emails to purchase or of "sales" they are having since my initial purchase on January 4th 2021.
When you try to communicate you are routed to a formstack form not an actual email to correspond with anyone. I got a response that generalized when packages would be sent out but no response to my order even when I provided my order number.
Extremely frustrated that I did not do research when I always do. This company is trash and a fraud that uses Christianity to entice customers. So sad. Don't make the same mistake I did!!!

name: Lorraine Zee
text: Terrible customer service.  My order said it was shipped 3 weeks ago and I still haven’t received it.  No response to my emails, other than a message not to contact them multiple times.

name: Debbie Kirby
text: I ordered  from this company I never received  a tracking number,I found a phone number but its always busy.I sent several emails with no response  to any of them.my order was $47.36. This is suppose to be a Christian  website so I don't know.I hope I get my order.

name: Kelly Bidwell
text: Love their shirts!!❤

name: Sue Brake
text: I made a purchase and was happy with the purchase on July 10 2020  then they debited my account for  $19.97 on August 10 like it was some type of monthly autoship which I did not sign up for or authorized.  I have sent several emails and left 2 detailed messages to cancel order and credit by account for the unauthorized transaction.  Is this really the way a Christian -based website does business?? I would like to think NOT....please contact me as soon as possible!!!!!

name: Starasia Batten
text: They never send a tracking number and still haven't gotten my things...I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THIS SITE AT ALL‼‼‼‼‼‼‼‼😡

name: April Astorga
text: Horrible customer service...no response to multiple emails, order status not updated and it's been 2 weeks since I placed my order, did I mention this is my first order.  Stay clear!!!!

name: Cindy Richardson
text: I have had the worst experience with this company ever, when I use my discount for waiting a year to get my order, and I got a gift card coming too. They take sooo long to ship your order

name: Jennette Brent
text: They keep taking my money. Please stop.

name: donna Goodwin
text: My name is Donna Goodwin an this company stinks I ordered on 4-25-2021 bought my items with my debit I still don't have my order I payed $135.97  this company is suppose to be Christian basiced well  I beg the differ I need my order or my money

name: Chad Kimsey
text: I was sent a package from this company and I DIDN"T even order anything. I have tried and tried to get in touch with them, you only get a message when you call saying to go to their website where you are suppose t o be able to live chat--couldn't do that!!! Now I am almost $90 in the whole on my credit card, which I don't even know how they got my card number; and have 6 t shirt some the same styles but in different sizes----I CAN'T EVEN WEAR THEM IF I WANTED TOO, NOT MY SIZES ! I am really confused and disappointed and can't seem to be able to fix the problem. And I am getting e-mail now telling me I am a VIP costumer and in the VIP Club!!!!! How is this possible??? AND to top it all----they gave themselves a $5.00 tip!!!! REALLY

name: Mandy Stella
text: I ordered three custom items in November, knowing to expect a few weeks for delivery. As of January 29, 21 I still don't have my items. They were sent out for delivery, sent to wrong address and sent back to them. I have been reassured they would be sent back, but now I can't get anyone to update on when to expect them to be shipped. HIGHLY DISAPPOINTED!

name: Carmen Stroud
text: Poor customer service.  I have been trying to personally talk to someone since 12/26/20 and as of this date 2/5/21still no contact.  Poor quality and service.  Would not recommend this business to anyone

name: Karen Coppock
text: I ordered 2 solar crosses APRIL 26, 2021, here it is June 4, 2021 and still no crosses. I have sent them emails and all I get back is automated replies that someone will get back with me, no contact with anyone as of yet!!! At this point, I want my money back!!

name: Tracey W.
text:
Great company! 5*
Communication! 5*
Products! 5*
Fast Shipping! 5*
My son's custom cross was cracked due to the mowing crew not watching what they're doing at the cemetery. I called the  Eternal Light company to see if about getting another ones, without any problems I have a replacement coming in the mail. Thank you so very much Eternal Light!! God Bless you all!!

name: Barb Matern
text: I received my product quickly, was very pleased with this product. Much better looking in person, than it looked online. I was very pleased with my order. Thanks

name: Dorthy Brock
text: I ordered the custom made solar crosses and they were absolutely beautiful! I received them in a timely fashion!

name: K Niblett
text: Ordered the solar heart with personalization cheap plastic, name coming off as soon as it was taken out of box. Cant get back off where batteries go. Did I say cheap? Left in sun for a few days no light. Called office no answer. Talked to Peyton on line she was suppose to call first thing this morning to tell me how to send back. It is now 12:00 and no call. Doesnt surprise me with this company. Dont buy from them. This is so sad since this was a death and I'm having to deal with this company.

name: Tonya
text: My mom passed away 2 years ago unexpectedly from cancer that had went undiagnosed. I have had such a difficult time dealing with it because she was so young and her first grandchild was to be born just shy of her being called to heaven. It was difficult visiting the gravesite. I seen the ad onlight for Eternal Light. They are actually heaven sent. The support they gave and the most beautiful products they supply was absolutely nothing short of amazing. The lighted Cross I recieved gave me the strength to go and visit where my mom was laid to rest and Im so greatful to them. Most important is the fact they are a small Christian based business that does everything in their power to accommodate their customers. I highly recommend to anyone especially during a grievance period.

name: Lorene Chavez
text: On 5/1/2019 I placed an order for the eternal light pink floral package with solar angel and did the 2 day priority. Today 5/9/2019 I received just the arrangement and it looked nothing like the arrangement s on the website and I did not get the angel at all.My grandchildren are very upset because this was for them to put on their mother's gravesite for Mother's Day and when I called themthey did not apologize or anything. The person that took my call just seemed to not care at all that I am breaking these kids hearts by not having their mother's day angel for their mother.

name: Debbie Ebenhaet
text: I ordered the cardinal canvas in memory of our son. His middle name was spelled wrong. I have called company and I always get voicemail.  I have been dealing with this for months. I just want them to make it right.

name: Scuba Steve
text: This place is fraud!!!

name: Jeff Moore
text: Order two arrangements on the 17th of May spoke with multiple people at Eternal Light all stating they were ships but could not provide a tracking # finally spoke with Payton and she said she they would get them out to me by Saturday (today). What a waste of $$$ they look nothing like the photos on the website only 8 flowers p/ arrangement and they are glued to bricks and shipped with little to no packing, arrangement arrived damaged.  DO NOT BUY FROM THIS COMPANY, save your $$$$ better off going to Wal Mart and doing them your self.  If I could post pictures I would.  By they there customer service reps will give you wrong names so they won’t get caught lying to you!

name: kristysmith
text: I order 2 of the solar lighted crosses that i  customized . I would like to say they are  beautiful great work  and thank you.

name: Mary Piscil
text: I just received my cards today and I loved them ya did a good job thank you

name: Entela Lako
text: I buy a cross light for my husband it  was very nice . I am very happy  about the order and the  service . I had an issue with the ground part because it broke and they sent me the new one and didn't charge me anything .  They are a family owned buisnes and trying to do their best on every way.

name: Brenda Hrywny
text: DO NOT order from this company you'll be sorry. I ordered a canvas and never did receive it nor any correspondence from them. I emailed time and time again. I called and never spoke to a person, only an answering machine to leave a message. I have now filed complaints with the BBB and PayPal. They took $70.00+ out of my checking account and I got nothing in return. That was supposed to be a gift for my 80 year old in laws so it is heartbreaking that a so called religious company would treat me a senior citizen like this. I have read many, many reviews from the BBB where they have done this to others. So be aware....I learned the hard way and ordered from them after seeing their ad on Facebook.

name: Dana Reagan
text: My order arrived yesterday and I am very disappointed and dissatisfied!!! The quality is just not there! If I could post a picture here, I would show what a sorry job was done in wrapping the corners and how grainy the print is on the canvas. On top of quality issues, my order was incorrect! I ordered 2 of the same name, then 2 others with different names. I received 4 of the same name! I didn't need 4 of the same name and the I would be ashamed to give something of this lack of quality as a gift as I had planned when ordering them. A total waste of money on my part!

name: nancy baldassaro
text: Terrible customer service had a cross that I needed replaced will not replace it said replace the batteries! Told them That’s the first thing I did and then deleted my posts! Will take my business elsewhere!!

name: wynnwalker2
text: Customer service is the best

name: James Gaul
text: This company is a joke, do not order any type of item that is personalized  it probably won't be right

name: Olivia B
text: Extremely helpful and wonderful business! I cannot express how much I appreciate the owner for allowing customers to come in and print designs. He's extremely knowledgeable about the various different tshirt designing  methods and cares about all of his customers. All around a great guy running a great business. This will be where I come back for any future tshirt/printing needs! Thank you SO much for helping save my online business when my equipment was down. You're the best!

name: Stephanie Taffanelli
text: Excellent service nice people work

name: Rhonda Allen
text: This is a Great place to get customized work done. They work with you to complete your project with wonderful suggestions. The prices are reasonable and they were quick too.

name: Dianne Ratcliff
text: I love this place, they have prints you can’t find anywhere else in town.

name: Anitra Daffin
text: Great customer service. Very friendly, reasonable and knowledgeable. He stayed late even after his regular store hours to make sure we were happy.

name: Jasmine Wright
text: Love these guys! I go to him at least once a week for something! Always done right. Always nice. Send text when items are done. Hands down, great place!! And prices are next to nothing!

text: Very poor communication. They told us we needed a minimum order of 36 t shirts, we had over 60 shirts. Gary was very rude to us and told us that our order was not worth their time. I do not recommend Inkworks and if you do decide to do business with them I would Highly not recommend Gary.

name: Jessica H
text: This company has poor communication and says one thing on the phone and another in an email. They messed up our order as well and caused it to be even further delayed. I used based off the fact they are a provider for someone I know and did not use either of my friends in the business, however this was a big mistake. On the phone we discussed Gilden and in an email I was quoted some poor quality shirts as a price match. I am sorry, but a shirt of poorer quality is not an equal match. I hope the people who get these shirts don't fuss too much because I am not happy I even have to give them to them. They represent my group poorly and I will not do business with them again. They did apologize, but that was a little too late and not enough especially considering I still have no shirts, but they have managed to get other shirts to our school.  If you have a contract with a school you should keep their colors in stock, however they must not because I kept being told they had to order. Ridiculous...

text: Great service, good product. Better location than the previous downtown location.

name: Nicole M. Zaffiris
text: This company is terrible. Sent them an order for a large client. They printed the wrong blue in spite of being clearly stated on the purchase order in two places and then would not return calls or emails. Customer received the shirts and informed us that the 2XL's were completely missing.  After repeated phone calls and unanswered emails we replaced the shirts at our expense. They have had those shirts for two months now and when push came to shove today after asking when the shirts would be printed we were first told by Teresa that their machine broke down and they needed to send out for parts. When I asked them if all five machine broke down at the same time I then received a call back from Carol who said she was the owner and I was told they would not be printing the shirts because they were less than their minimum. Minimum?  I guess that they have no problem with not correcting their mistake. Coincidently I have a copy of there price list and on it states 1 is the minimum so not sure why 22 shirts is less than minimum. I have been in business for 32 years and I value a good vendor that stands behind their work. This is definitely not the case with InkWorks.

text: I love their shirts and supporting small business that is a Christ centered company! The only thing that would make it better is quicker shipping but since I also work for a small, growing company, I understand can sometimes be unforeseeable setbacks. They’re good to communicate those changes and also have many opportunities through the week to get these great shirts for super low price. He gave his life for me many years ago and I stand on God's word today it blesses my heart when they give there heart to him. My grandson was going to camp last week and he said nanny can I take one of your shirts to wear and one to give as a gift. I told him he could. He was sitting beside this guy and Dalton was ministering to the guy and won him to the Lord at youth camp last week. He told Dalton that he would be back next year. I'm  a widow striving to help save lives for my Lord. Its been a struggle living on a fixed income but God's always there to make a way for me. I don't see how I make it from month to month but God always provides and takes care of me. I love what you'll are doing. God bless you'll and I pray that you'll be blessed beyond measure. God bless and I pray that you'll will have another bless week.

Thanks
Marie kirby

Funny it was a "Choose Joy!" T-shirt. Sorry, but not feeling much joy over this transaction!

The only thing you need to remember is shipping will not be Amazon speed- but my confirmation e-mail clearly stated the expected time frame for delivery and that has always been spot on. name: sandy lamont
text:
I purchased on-line products with Wish 3 or 4 times always receiving faded colors, the sizes cut way to small, jewelry that turned green in two days.
I finally gave up, never getting what I thought I was going to receive.

The second company I purchased a product from was for a metal cross with a praying solider yard ornament.  I received a beautiful one, but it was only 2" taller than my grass!   What a waste of $50.00!

I told myself that was my last on-line purchase.  So I was very skeptical when I placed an order with Eternal Light for a lighted cross in memory of my deceased husband.  I was shocked when I received it to discover it was exactly the item I ordered!  The protective shipping packaging, the size, the color, the instructions enclosed to operate it were  all perfect!  My faith has been restored!  My Memorial Lighted Cross is the best !!!

I still do not order many things on line because items look like the same cheap products I was taken advantage of ordering earlier, but I truly trust Eternal Light with all of their products.  I am in the process of searching for an urn that I saw in their inventory earlier this year.  I look forward to my next purchase thru Eternal Light.  A very competent, friendly, trustworthy company!

Thank you from a happy camper,
Saundra Lamont
Baltimore, Maryland

Ok…. I am skeptical….

But this is my review from my service from a purchase in FALL 2020: Excellent customer service. Great products! Softest t-shirt especially for being purchased online; very impressed with the designs as well. I get compliments all the time on my T-shirts!

To date: I am seeing emails that may be mocking the true site; please be careful! I’ll update as soon as I get replies as to what is correct….

Maybe check FACEBOOK and go through their site there….

I’m sorry for all those that got taken advantage of - my purchase was true, correct, excellent, but unfortunately there are scammers everywhere knocking sites and stealing ….

please contact your bank and/or Credit card company and report the purchase As fraudulent. They should refund your money 100% no problem. No matter how long it has been.

name: Erica Davis
text:
I first found Eternal Light when shopping for my mother's Christmas gifts. She had just been diagnosed with stage 4 cancer, and I wanted her to have reminders to keep her faith, stay strong, and give the battle to God. Since my first order, I have since placed over a dozen more orders in 6 months for t-shirts and solar lights.
The t-shirts are very soft and comfortable, and they keep their shape after washing. The prints on the shirts are done very well- no peeling, flaking, etc. Shipping does take a while, usually 4-8 weeks, but they're worth the wait.
The angel solar lights are impressive. The entirety of the angel lights up from inside. The light is bright and reliably comes on with the setting sun. The solar lights also arrive much quicker than the t-shirts, usually less than a week.

name: Kalia Stewart
text:
I first want to say that I am NOT being paid or receiving any sort of promotion for posting this review. I do this from my own heart, to promote positive feedback from an amazing company. I do not know any of the employees personally nor do I work for them in any way:

I have ordered from this site multiple times. I've gotten probably close to 30 shirts from this company, some for me and some as gifts for others. The shirts are wonderful quality, true to size, and super soft and breathable cotton! The print on them hasn't faded or chipped on any of my shirts and I have washed them and dried them multiple times. I love the message they convey and pray that someone reads my shirt and asks for more information about my Lord and savior,  Jesus Christ!
The only negative thing I can say is that shipping tends to take a little longer, but I don't blame the company for this. COVID has caused delays in shipping. Bad weather has also put shipping behind at times nationwide I think the longest I waited on a package was about a month, but it was also a large order.

My only issue is with the support service. It takes a pretty long time to get a response. This is a small family business, so I don't consider this to be a deal breaker for me. And, since I love everything I've purchased, I don't' plan to returning a thing!

text: I love receiving my Eternal Light subscription every month!!! For less than $20 I get a new comfy t-shirt to wear that expresses my faith as I go about my day. I also receive a 30-day Bible study that coordinates with the t-shirt and a gorgeous sticker that also goes with the study to place where ever I like! An added bonus is the coupon for $10 off any additional purchases with Eternal Light, not to mention Free Fridays! Every Friday I receive a text offering a free t-shirt and I only pay shipping and handling. There are even more items that come in the subscription too! I love my Eternal Light subscription! You will too! Trust me!

name: Robin Borland
text:
This is a fairly new company, so sometimes you have to wait 3-5 weeks to receive your order, (not always) but once you do it’s well worth it. The print on the shirts are never crooked. (I’m too ocd for that!!) The shirts are great quality! My fav is Bella Canvas!! (Send all my shirts on those, please!! Lol). They do free Friday shirts and you only pay the $7.99 for shipping. So basically, if you look at it positively, you’re either getting a free shirt (win) and helping them out (small local business) by covering shipping…or, you’re paying $7.99 for the shirt and free shipping…either way, that’s a low cost shirt, yet well made, and I’ll take it!! I’ve had one issue with payment confirmation, and after a couple of emails, I was taken care of! No issues! I support this company and appreciate what they sell!! They send encouraging emails to you, bc they truly do LOVE GOD and show this! I am all about supporting someone who loves the Lord!! Thanks Trent and Fam!
Robin.

text: The t-shirt is well-made and accurately sized, the fabric soft, not too thin, the sentiment on the front "There's another in the fire... Daniel 3:25" reminds myself and maybe others that we do not walk alone through our tribulations... God is with us.  At the time of my order there were catastrophic tornadoes in the company's vicinity.  I didn't know it and emailed inquiring about my order and they responded.  It did take quite a while for my order to arrive.  I certainly have no complaint, since mine was a promotion that only required I pay nominal shipping.  I am glad my order wasn't intended as a gift needed for a particular date.  I hope their neighborhood is recovering from the tornado devastation.

I have also subscribed to the monthly Christian box shipment and every time I think about cancelling, I change my mind because I like the shirts so much 😊.

Also of note, I too had my reservations when a few shipments were delayed.  They did respond, I have received everything I order, and they previously advised they are working on the shipment issues.  Shipping is still a little delayed, but a little patience can go a long way.

text: Horrible service!!! I get teasers on IG that say claim your free shirt, just pay shipping and one month later I still haven’t received my shirt.  This has occurred  several times. They tried sending me two other shirts of my choice within a certain price range and every time I emailed them my choices, they were out of the shirts.  I finally got my two shirts in March, three months later.  Not happy at all!!!

name: Rachel Perdue
text:
I started out ordering a shirt that I had seen through my Facebook feed. Once on the website, I had the opportunity to add a subscription to a Christian Box. I decided to try it out! Boy did it pay off. I've received a few boxes and love the shirts that come with them. They also provide some sort of reading material. Sometimes it's a month long devotion, other times something different. The box also had a sticker that corresponded with the shirt and reading material. And finally they give you a gift card to come back and buy more!
I would 10 out of 10 recommend this business!

**Note: I had no issues receiving my shirt or the Christian boxes. Once I would see the charge on my card, it did take about 2 weeks, maybe a little more to be delivered.

name: Shelby Fox
text: I hope I could leave a zero. Took my payment and never sent my order. PLEASE DO NOT ORDER FROM THIS PLACE. There is no relationship between them and the Lord I serve. Deceitful a d dishonest. Cannot call them, no valid phone number.  No real person communication,  only computer generated fake responses.  Thankful to PayPal for getting my money back. I lost my sister in March and my Mom in February,  I wanted a special item they offered for the gravesite. I was very disappointed they claimed to be something or someone they are not. :(

text: I signed up to receive a monthly box from Eternal Light Company. Everything is such good quality. My devotionals are beautiful and I love them. Each sticker is beautiful and a good size: I have even given some away as a little gift for coworkers. The t-shirts are so soft and fit exactly right. I like my clothing to be a little loose and the shirts fit with just enough give to keep me comfortable. I’m a bigger girl and the shirts help me show off my shape but not too tight. Overall, I only spend $10 month for the box subscriptions. I feel like the value of the items far exceed what I pay. Thank you, Eternal Light Co. for what you do!

name: Annette Edwards
text:
I cannot say enough on the quality of these wonderful shirts! The material is so soft, feels great and comfortable when wearing. It is already pre-shrunk and the sizing is true to size. I'll be honest,  i haven't really worn t-shirts in years. However when I was BLESSED to be able to get a free one and put it on, I was sold!!😊 It was because of that FREE shirt that got me sold on these wonderful t-shirts!

I don't know about you, but I get very leary when you see an ad that tells you that you can get something free. Just last year I signed  up for something free off of Facebook, only to find out that it was a hoax! Not only did I not get the free item, but they charged my card for close to $70.00 on things that I never asked for or gave permission for. That is NOT the case with Eternal Light Co.  This Christian Company is very honest and forthcoming. Not only are they honest but their goal is to deliver shirts across the globe to those in need. That is truly AMAZING in this day and age. They want to honor our Lord and Saviour, JESUS!

The awesome thing about wearing these t-shirts is that you are wearing "The word of God "! In this day and age where there is so much turmoil, we need to be sharing the Word of God with others. But you know as much as I do that you can't just share with others unless they want you to. That is why I really  love these shirts, because you ARE sharing about the Word of God but in a nonchalant way...JUST BY WEARING A T-SHIRT! It is a silent witness. It is amazing how often I see others looking at the messages, they may not say anything...but they ARE reading it!

I hope you try these wonderful shirts and give a small family business, your business for the wonderful company that they are!

name: MJ Brashears
text: I'm actually quite surprised that they sent me a link to leave a Google review after my experience with this company. A little bit about myself. I come from a small town in Missouri. I was saved at an old fashioned, missionary Baptist Church when I was 13 years old and have a great relationship with our savior. I'd say he's my best friend. When I read about this company I was excited to help a small business, to spread the word of God and to show off my family's salvation. I never received my orders of $300 worth of shirts and hats for myself. I waited from April til almost June until I sent my first email to Support but Support didn't email me back. Then when I started receiving my orders after I began to think it was a scam bc after all the Christian box is a monthly subscription and I was entering the third month for my husband and i's Christian box membership and had not received one yet. The first order was missing shirts, gift cards, stickers I had ordered...no response back from Trent or support. I told them to refund my money and cancel my subscriptions. I got a confirmation of cancellation for subscription but no refunds on subscriptions for my husband's or my 3 months of box's. 2nd order came...missing items. I emailed support and Trent. No answer. Meanwhile still getting daily sales/promotion emails to buy more. Then my husband's box arrives 2 months after my first order mind you I've paid for three for him and this isn't the box I paid for or the size I ordered for him. I emailed Trent and support. No answer. They've sent me a free t-shirt coupon to make up for disputes. What about my husband's 3 months of size large boxes including the Judges 6 Christian Men's warrior Box and My 3 Women's box's and the rest of my orders? I wouldn't order from this company. The have good quality, nice things but obviously can't fill their orders and never make it right and don't reply back. I've prayed and prayed about what to do and now have to put this into the laws hands. $300 is quite a lot to lose for a family of 6 in a pandemic.

name: pamela baxter
text: My daughter and I both love the shirts I buy from this company! They always use high quality t-shirts. The fabric is incredibly soft and they are sized correctly and do not shrink up when washing/drying. The print on the shirts is very high quality as well. I have washed and dried our shirts numerous times and the print has not faded or started to peel off at all. I took advantage of the free Christian box and chose to continue to receive them monthly for my 13 year old daughter. She loves getting her "box" every month! Your first Christian box is free, you pay s&h.. and then if you choose to keep the subscription, it is $20/monthly. You get a shirt, an affirmation card, a journey book, a sticker and a $10 gift card in EVERY box! Customer service is another thing that this company got right. They are very quick and reasonable about handling any issue you may have. They have free shirts on Fridays that you only pay about $8 (s&h) for, and on Monday, they have $5 shirts. They donate a shirt for every shirt sold on "Mission Monday." I honestly cannot think of one negative thing to say about this business. Try them, you'll love what you get!

Most owner are in the background... but Peyton is on the front lines, answering questions the best she can directly. THE ONLY REASON I didn't give it 5 stars... is because if you want to be completely honest, there production and shipping may be a little different than some understand... and take a little longer than their on demand:" I want my t-shirt within a week" customers. For the quality and the good they are sharing... I'm ok with the wait. But maybe this could be something they could express or explain and not promise 3-5 day shipping. text: We ordered a memorial for our son/step-son and two angels that are all solar powered, We created Brandon's garden which is where we have these items located. They are visible from our patio where we have our outdoor events.Anyway, the thing is Brandon is always part of our family functions and we all are so appreciative of this and thank you.

name: Susanna Brown
text:
I have really enjoyed Eternal Light, both their products and the encouraging emails they send out.  The T-shirts are beautiful, soft , and each one has a great message.  I purchased a few shirts and then signed up for the monthly Christian box, which as been so good.  It comes with a shirt, devotional, sticker (for your water bottle or whatever), a card with a bible verse, and a $10 gift certificate!  And, everything in the box is themed, which is so fun!
Two things that may bother some people are the (relatively) slow response to emails and fairly slow processing/shipping time. But, the way I look at it is this; Eternal light is small, family-run company, so it's understandable that they're not going to have 2 day shipping like Amazon.  I like to support small businesses, so waiting a little longer than "normal" for products (that I really enjoy) is worth it to me.

name: valerie valadez
text: I fell In love with the T-shirts. I’ve order a few and can’t wait to order more. Thank you for sharing God’s word and His love ❤️ 🙏

text: I’m a born again Christian and I’m very excited to subscribe and  to buy and support them. They are awesome I truly love the quality of the shirts and the positive message it brings to many of us thank you guys for your amazing work maybe one day we can all meet !

name: Charlotte Witte
text: The shirts are of superior quality. Soft and wash up nicely. Just got a cap and it seems to be top-quality also. On two occasions I reached out to the customer service and they solved the problem promptly. One was due to Post Office taking so long to get it to me because it was damaged. By then they had refunded my money and five days later the package came with an apology from the US PS. I wanted to then repay them but they said for the inconvenience that just to keep them.The other issue was computer related and quite possibly could’ve been due to my erratic Internet. Both situations were solved to my satisfaction. I highly recommend their products to you. Great designs with excellent messages for all of us. God Bless!!!

text: Eternal Light Company is one of the best online businesses that I have shopped with. I have ordered several shirts from them and have been extremely thrilled with each one. Not overly happy with this company anymore. Hopefully they will see the negative reviews and start making some positive changes.

name: Dalena Kelley
text:
I love the shirts!
HOWEVER, it is IMPOSSIBLE to get in touch with any type of customer service. The website charged me 3 times for one order. I received one order of shirts, but never received my refund for the 2 other times I was charged.

name: Tonia Wilson
text: Have ordered multiple times. Shirts have always been good quality. Highly recommend!  Keep spreading the Word of God.

name: Sara Williams
text:
Every time I order, this company puts a smile on my face! Their t-shirts are my favorite! I’ve ordered too many to count for myself, and several for my son and fiancé.

Recently, I ordered the lighted angel for my niece’s grave as a birthday gift for what would’ve been her 17th birthday.💕 I made a mistake while entering the address to my sister’s house where I wanted it delivered. Eternal Light caught my mistake, and reached out to me to confirm my address to make sure that it made it to my sister. My sister not only got the order in time for my niece’s birthday, but she loves it! She said that it was too beautiful to leave outside, so she keeps it by the window in my niece’s room instead. Eternal Light has been a blessing to my family, and the messages on my t-shirts are perfect conversation pieces that allow me to minister to people as I meet them throughout the day!

name: Ingrid Smith
text: Eternal Light is one company that carries  quality product. Everything that I’ve  received , I really enjoy it. On a scale 1-10 I give them a perfect 10.

name: Peggy Whisner
text: Friendly and have the best customer service I have experienced in a long time.

name: Sandra Osterberg
text: I must say for being such a difficult time they were so very caring and helpful, made a world of difference.  I had never purchased a headstone prior and I was absolutely pleased with the process and the finished product. I would absolutely recommend them.

name: David Mccoy
text: i have bought several decals from eternal light and would recomend  them to anyone great product

name: Debbie Ramey
text: I have ordered several T-shirts from Eternal Light.  Their T-shirts are well made, soft, and fit well and true to size.  The designs are awesome and the prices amazing!

name: Angela Sherman
text: Eternal Light Co. sold me solar lights to eliminate my address numbers at night and they worked better than I imagined! What I didn’t know was that they were a Christian Store and continued to periodically email me uplifting emails that brightens my day and inspire me! I got more than I purchased and plan to definitely make Eternal Light Co. my go to for outdoor solar lighting needs, among other things!

text:
I have order multiple t-shirts from Eternal Light Co.  For myself,
Daughter, Granddaughter, and friends.
I have been extremely pleased with the quality of shirt and print
on each one of them.  They are true to size and so soft and comfortable.
It does my soul good, when my 9 year old Granddaughter wants us to wear
our shirts together.  I have received so many compliments on my shirts.

I will continue to order these, great messages so needed in these difficult times. These ppl are the real deal. No hidden fees. Just honest to goodness great deals, great prices, great message!

Love you guys!!
Sincerely, Janey Conant

I got the cap with the cross and the word "faith" intertwined, and have had folks mention how much the liked the cap or in one case, gave me the high sign for the message it gave.  I think you'll really like the products and purpose this company offers.

I sent 5 email - they responded to only 1.  They promised refunds - I only received 1 of them.  The entire experience was terribly disappointing, their customer service is nonexistent.  In summary - buyer beware - this company is terrible, I recommend going ANYWHERE else.

name: Susan Miller
text:
My husband and I absolutely love the T-shirts that Eternal Light offer! 😍
They are so soft and true to their size. The graphics are great on them and the prices are fair. They give back by offering Mission Monday and Free Fridays! I have ordered many of these for myself and my husband. They make great gifts for family and friends! The biggest reason we love them is, when we wear them we are sharing God and a great message for others to see. I have had many people who will tell me they love my shirt. You never know when the words your wearing might just be what another person that you don't even know needs to hear. One day I was wearing one of the Bee🐝 Kind shirts and I passed a guy going into a store and he hurried up in front of me and opened the door for me, I said, "thank you" and he replied, I'm trying to Bee Kind". We both smiled and I went on my way trying my best to wear my message well. 😊
Thank you to all those who work hard at Eternal Light for helping to share Kindness and God's Love! ❤

But I will hold out on ordering anything else until I receive my t-shirts. And Fyi I also done a second order from them and still have not gotten the order number not any other update.

I purchased it over a year ago and it’s held up very well!  I’ve still not even had to change the batteries yet.

The solar cross came within a reasonable time. Unfortunately, it’s very hard to get customer service this year for anything related to my shirt orders lately... and I’m still owed a refund to my card. Also, it took 6 weeks to receive my shirts lately. That’s why I won’t order for a while, atleast as far as clothing, even though I love the shirts.  Because it’s happened twice.

Other than that,
Thank you Eternal Light Company!!

I recently visited Walmart and thought I would try on one of their same type of shirts and what I found out is their t-shirts don't fit as well, the eternal light t-shirts were much more softer, and eternal light has sales all the time which ends up costing me much less in the long run. At this point, I will purchasing all my t-shirts from eternal light because I love them that much. I believe, but don't quote me lol, I have purchased about 8-10 shirts at this point and absolutely plan to continue buying more in the very near future. If you haven't tried this company, I suggest you try it right away...I think one of the greatest things about their t-shirts is it promotes our love for Jesus and His love for us.

Murphy, NC

name: Marianne Violette
text: I love Eternal Light Co. They have a great selection of t shirts and they are wonderfully soft and comfortable.  My grandchildren love them and they watch the mail continually wondering what new shirt Grandma will be sending them next.  My oldest granddaughter will be spending her first week as a counselor at Bible Camp this summer so I have sent her a selection of seven shirts so that she will have a new one for each day.  She is so excited for her new adventure as a counselor and now having these shirts to look forward to wearing has made it even more special for her.  Keep up the good work providing these wonderful shirts that help to make the wearer a walking testimony for our God and our faith.  Trent also takes the time to email some wonderful little devotionals on a regular basis and they are always a blessing.  I look forward to them and go right to them first when I see them in my inbox.  The Eternal Light company makes shopping a blessing - Thank you and your special little family.  God Bless.

name: Jillian Palazola
text: Love my shirt! It's so soft and the fit is perfect. I'm 5'6" and 150lb - it's baggy enough to be comfortable and hide my mama belly but fitting enough that I still keep my female figure. The length is nice too - falls just around the top of the butt and I have an avg to long torso. "Another in the fire" is one of my favorite stories and the first time I wore it I had someone ask me about it! What a chance to share the gospel. I've washed it a couple of times and the quality is still there, but I won't dry it as I'm afraid it may shrink and it fits perfect. It did take a long time to ship, but I was sent an email with an update as to why (weather issues), which was nice - worth the wait! Would definitely buy from Eternal Light again!

name: ThePeacocks Ward
text:
I was introduced to Gator Vinyl and the world of vinyl in general by a friend of mine. I had NO idea what to expect when I first visited and oh boy was I impressed. The store itself is packed with items and a tight fit for sure, but I am not complaining! They had everything under the sun for vinyl, crafting and blanks. The T-shirt selection is amazing, every color and size you could want at VERY reasonable prices. They have plenty of blanks from cozies, license plates, bows, children's clothing, jackets, etc etc etc! Their sublimation blanks are coming in strong as well, a great selection of 100% polyester and poly cotton blends, cups, tumblers, coasters, sublimation vinyl and more I have not even looked at yet, every time I go they have something new in to play with! Oh and the VINYL! Sooooo many options. They have a HUGE selection of permanent vinyl as well as Heat Transfer, from patters, to glitter, to just about every color of the rainbow in matte and/or glossy.

Now let's talk about customer service... I do not think I have encountered such consistent good customer service in a long time. Most of the times I have visited have been fairly busy and the employees are working hard at various tasks or helping other customers. I have asked many questions about various products, inventory and have always gotten informed answers. If one person did not know they found the person who did know the answer. I was quite amazed with the effort to help me out in gaining swatches to show clients, beyond what I would have imagined. I have been in the market for a Cameo 4 and their prices were comparable but I found an online location that had it cheaper, but since I have had such great experiences I made the decision to buy local.

Less than a week later the Cameo went on sale at Gator and not expecting to get a refund (Exchanges only with receipt 30 days) I sent a Facebook message to see if it was possible to get a store credit on the difference.
I got a prompt response to come on in with the receipt during the sale. I returned with the receipt and was happily given a store credit for the difference in price. Talk about a kid in a candy store!

I look forward to working with Gator Vinyl for a long time to come and would recommend them to anyone crafter or otherwise. You cannot go wrong with the exceptional customer service, reasonable prices, and an owner with a human touch.

name: Shannon O'Connor
text: They have absolutely EVERYTHING and they are really good people. We buy from them often.

name: Olivia Kenny
text:
I found out about this place by looking up vinyl near me on google. The store itself is well stocked and has a nice and large variety of crafting supplies.
Now, other than that, one shop attendant followed me during practically the entire duration of my visit, aisle to aisle. I stayed for at least twenty minutes and this lady was never more than 10 feet away. I thought it was rude and a little disturbing.
Next, the prices you see on the website attached to their store are not the same as in the store. When I asked an employee about that, she denied their having a website. Her colleague interceded and said it was outdated and the prices were wrong. When I got to the cash register, I asked if I could leave the vinyl with the cashier. She asked me why. I had to explain to her that I changed my mind. Then she started mumbling and didn't respond when I said "have a nice day." Of the two staff ladies, one was on her phone the whole time and the other was verbally rude. Neither smiled at me once.
All in all, I thought the store was well equiped but the staff rude and unprofessional. The general experience was unpleasant. I will not be returning.

text:
Decent prices, the vinyl is also pretty good. I go once a week, I like their new store a lot. And the small kids shopping carts are super cute.
If this rating was based solely not the store and not the workers it would be an easy 4 star maybe 5.

The problem with the store are the employees.
They aren’t rude, but they aren’t friendly and it’s a effort to get them to pay attention to you and your inquiries opposed to their phones or each other.

This is not an isolated incident, as I said we visit this store whenever My local store doesn’t have a certain color or texture because Gator Sign has everything. We drive over 45 min to go to this particular store. And every single time, except the first time we visited and the owner gentle man was there he was very sweet and helpful, the customer service just sucks besides that one time with the owner.

Will we stop going? Not yet, for right now I like the variety they have and it’s not like they are rude and make the visit unbearable. It’s just annoying, and not something I would recommend to friends.
I hope they get better at customer interactions because that could make the trips to this store and shopping experience way better. But I don’t have high hopes, 6 months of shopping at Gator sign and it either steadily gets worse or stays the Same blah experience.

name: M
text: Called the store today and was told that they can't WASTE TIME checking on a particular shirt for me. I have never been told this at any of the other shops around town. I understand that they are a larger store and have a lot of customers, but this is terrible customer service. You never tell the customer that their request is a WASTE OF TIME. You tell them that you don't normally do this or somehting else. That being said, they did check on the shirt for me. At the end of the conversation, I thanked the person and told them that I appreciated them checking, but they shouldn't use the words WASTE TIME when talking to a customer. He said" I didn't say that and I did go look for you" and began to talk over me.  My question is why would I bring something up about it if nothing was said and they just checked on the shirt for me?

resp.text: Thank you for addressing your concern.  We have investigated the issue.  From our understanding, there has been a little miscommunication on the behalf of our rookie employee.  A lot of clothing has been moved around becuase we are opening a bigger store across the street and the new employee was having troulbe understand what you was discribing as the shirt you were looking for.  He might have been missunderstood or use the wrong communication a little. We did find he didn't communicate clearly what he meant by "waste of time".  We agree no one should tell you as a customer that something you want to know is a "waste of time". We are 100% sure that's not how he meant it because he did find what you was looking for. He also said he corrected his self put you on hold and then looked for the shirt. The employee explained it to us that he didn't want to waste your time because he didn't know where the shirt was or what it was and where to begain looking for it.  Again, you are right he should have used better words to communicate. He admitted to not knowing where to begain looking and was lost on what to say or where to begin.  He also, explained he did search the store upside down to make sure your question was answered.  He explained he answered your question after looking for over 20 minutes.  We glad he did that.  Again, thank you for taking the time to help us understand how we can better serve you. We are 100% sure he as been corrected and will be more sensitive when helping customers with inventor questions.  Let us know if anything like this happens again.  We will take direct action.
